content.query:
-- DimCustomers

-- First check if table exists, if not then create
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM sys.tables t
    JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
    WHERE t.name = 'DimCustomer' 
      AND s.name = 'gold'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimCustomer
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimCustomer',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CustomerID,
        CustomerName,
        CustomerEmail,
        Domain,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CustomerID) AS DimCustomerKey
    FROM silver.silverTable;
END;
select * from gold.DimCustomer


-- DimProducts

-- First check if table exists, if not then create
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM sys.tables t
    JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
    WHERE t.name = 'DimProduct' 
      AND s.name = 'gold'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimProduct
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimProduct',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
        ProductID,
        ProductName,
        ProductCategory,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CustomerID) AS DimProductKey
    FROM silver.silverTable;
END;
SELECT * FROM gold.DimProduct




-- DimGeoGraphy

-- First check if table exists, if not then create
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM sys.tables t
    JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
    WHERE t.name = 'DimGeography' 
      AND s.name = 'gold'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimGeography
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimGeography',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
        RegionID,
        Country,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CustomerID) AS DimGeographyKey
    FROM silver.silverTable;
END;
SELECT * FROM gold.DimGeography



-- DimOrders

-- First check if table exists, if not then create
IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM sys.tables t
    JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
    WHERE t.name = 'DimOrders' 
      AND s.name = 'gold'
)
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.DimOrders
    WITH
    (
        LOCATION = 'DimOrders',
        DATA_SOURCE = gold_source,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet
    )
    AS
    SELECT 
        OrderID,
        CustomerID,
        CustomerName,
        CustomerEmail,
        ProductID,
        ProductName,
        ProductCategory,
        Domain,
        RegionID,
        Country,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CustomerID) AS DimOrdersKey
    FROM silver.silverTable;
END;
SELECT * FROM gold.DimOrders
